com.inmobi.conduit.metrics

Class SlidingTimeWindowGauge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.SlidingTimeWindowGauge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Long>, com.codahale.metrics.Metric

    public class SlidingTimeWindowGauge
extends Object
implements com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Long>
    A Gauge which is wrapped around a SlidingTimeWindowGuage. This will have a aggregated value for all the values collected for last n seconds.
